name: Party Parkade (itch)
description:
Party Parkade is a local couch multiplayer game where players compete against each other to score points by parking as cars. While colliding into your friends and environment, frantically looking for spots, and experiencing power-ups, the game is guaranteed to spark chaotic entertainment in your homes!

Features

Multiplayer Fun: Compete against up to 4 local friends for the ultimate roadside competition, or beat your time trial in solo play (We highly recommend playing with friends!)

Interactive Maps: Explore 3 different maps, from urban to natural, and battle in highly-interactive environments and terrains.

Chaotic Power-Ups: Fuel your battle with 6 different unique power-ups, creating chaos and unpredictability on the road!

Car Customization: Customize your car with personality through different vehicles, colours and patterns, and hat styles.

Thank you for playing Party Parkade!
